I arrived in Brazil yesterday for a speech, and was immediately struck that they call workers colaboradores.
It's a meaningful way to define the employment relationship. People are more than employees: they're collaborators or partners.

Stadium steps. 1 1/2 Kezars tonight! (1 1/2 laps of the stadium stairs at Kezar Stadium) First time in two years - can’t compare to two years ago, but cool that it didn’t feel as hard as I remember it first being 14 years ago when I first joined Team in Training’s cross-country ski team and we started land workouts there! (photo from 2 years ago - much colder tonight - until I started up those stairs - heated up fast!)

recommendations: Executive Transformation Coach - Agile/Lean/Scrum/XP/SAFe consulting at Wells Fargo
July 1, 2008, Diana worked with Peter in the same group

Diana provide Charles Schwab with excellent coordination of QA needs for the Charles Schwab Bank releases.  She was able to work readily with offshore resource and organized support for regularly scheduled releases of new code.  Diana also was adept at dealing with both business parnters and development teams.  She knows when to be blunt in enforcing the need for thorough testing and flexible in negotiating around critical issues.  Her contributions will be missed by the Charles Schwab QA team and I wish her the very best in her next endeavor.
